title: Where was Babcock & Wilcox located in Wilmington?
text:
Here's a link to an aerial photo of the plant:
http://cdm15169.contentdm.oclc.org/cdm4/item_viewer.php?CISOROOT=/p15169coll1&CISOPTR=1008&CISOBOX=1&REC=1



Does that help answer your question? I couldn't locate an address
for the plant.
